channel.title: Meetup on Daniel Brennand

item.title: Ansible Meetup 21 November 2024
item.description: I had an awesome time at the Ansible Meetup in London on the 21st of November 2024. The meetup was attended by around 25 people and was hosted at the Dell Technologies offices in London. The meetup was sponsored by Red Hat and Krameff Solutions. I did my first ever talk at a meetup titled: Infrastructure as Code - VPS provisioning and configuration on Hetzner Cloud. Hetzner is a public cloud provider I’ve used for personal projects and in my Homelab.
